t = int(input())

def ans():
    n = int(input())
    c = bin(n).count("1")
    ans = pow(2, c)

    print(ans)

tc = int(input())
for _ in range(tc):
    ans()

T=int(input())
for t in range(T):
    a=int(input())
    cnt=0

        if a%2==1:cnt+=1
        a>>=1
    print(1<<cnt)
